# Template Document Index

> Purpose: Detailed list of document/artifact templates

## Document List

| Name | Path | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **MA Session Kickoff Prompt** | [ma-session-kickoff-prompt.md](ma-session-kickoff-prompt.md) | Deliver "base injection + REQ/WI rules + progress tracking" in one prompt at new session start |
| **WI Subagent Handoff (Instruction Packet) Template** | [wi-subagent-handoff-template.md](wi-subagent-handoff-template.md) | MAâ†’Subagent instruction packet(=injection) WI template. Enforces uniform format |
| **ADR Template** | [adr-template.md](adr-template.md) | For decision records |
| **ADR Example** | [adr-example.md](adr-example.md) | Real-world ADR example: Reuse-first + Registry + Traceability |
| **Impact Analysis Template** | [impact-analysis-template.md](impact-analysis-template.md) | For impact analysis sheets |
| **DB Design Template** | [db-design-template.md](db-design-template.md) | For database design |
| **Interface Design Template** | [interface-design-template.md](interface-design-template.md) | For API/interface design |
| **IA (Information Architecture) Design Template** | [ia-design-template.md](ia-design-template.md) | For information architecture design |
| **Process Design Template** | [process-design-template.md](process-design-template.md) | For process/workflow design |
| **Eval Report Template** | [eval-report-template.md](eval-report-template.md) | For post-work evaluation reports |

| **Domain Context Template** | [domain-context-template.md](domain-context-template.md) | For project domain definitions |
| **Project Workboard Template** | [project-workboard.md](project-workboard.md) | For project status management (deprecated) |
| **Asset Promotion Checklist** | [asset-promotion-checklist.md](asset-promotion-checklist.md) | Asset promotion checklist |
| **New Project Request Template** | [project-request-template.md](project-request-template.md) | New project request form |

| **Requirements Request Template** | [requirements-request-template.md](requirements-request-template.md) | Requirements definition form |

## Template Usage Guide

- **Request Templates**: See `docs/guides/request-intake.md`
- **ADR Template**: Use for MEDIUM/HIGH changes, see `docs/guides/traceability.md`
- **Project Templates**: See `docs/guides/project-onboarding.md`
